name: ng-component-from-template
description: An handy to scaffold components from the selected text starting on the selected text inside an Angular component template

ngComponentFromTemplate.useSignalApis.description: Generate components using Signal APIs (input/output) instead of decorators (@Input/@Output)

ngComponentFromTemplate.changeDetectionS.description: Change detection strategy for the component

ngComponentFromTemplate.detectAngularVer.description: Automatically detect Angular version and use appropriate APIs

ngComponentFromTemplate.minimumAngularVe.description: Minimum Angular version to use Signal APIs (14-19)

ngComponentFromTemplate.useAngularLangua.description: Delegate template dependency resolution to Angular Language Service. When enabled, ALS automatically resolves and imports required directives, pipes, and components. Falls back to built-in detection if ALS is unavailable.

ngComponentFromTemplate.enablePreviewMod.description: Show interactive preview before generating component. When enabled, you can review and modify inputs/outputs, types, lifecycle hooks, and file contents before creation.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
